activities.name: Build Migration table for Process Strategies Employees

source.query:
drop table if exists migration_Strategy_Employee;

create table migration_Strategy_Employee AS
(
    with temp as 
    (
        select distinct
ps.newPortalProcessStrategyId portalProcessStrategyId,
ps.matrixName,
ps.functionName,
mfe.function_id,
pp.portalProcessId,
pp.functionalAreaName as portalProcessName,
fd.department_id,
d.portalFunctionalAreaId,
d.portalFunctionalAreaName,
mue.user_id,
u.username,
u.newUserId userId
 from T_BIA_MATRIX_USER_ENTRY mue
join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on mue.function_entry_id = mfe.id
join T_FUNCTION_DEPARTMENT fd on fd.FUNCTION_ID = mfe.function_id
join migration_portalfunctionalArea_data d on d.department_id = fd.department_id
join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = mfe.function_id and pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = d.portalFunctionalAreaId
join migration_all_user_data u on u.userId = mue.user_id
join migration_portalProcess_strategy ps on ps.portalProcessId = pp.portalProcessId
where entry_type = 'FUNCTION'
    )

    select
    ROW_NUMBER() over (order by portalProcessId) row_num
    , uuid() portalProcessStrategyEmployeeId
    , temp.* from temp
);

select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';

dependsOn.activity: Build Migration table for Process Strategies Employees
